name: nodejs-githooks-husky
description: Basic proyect with initial configuration with Husky package. This repository is part of a self-taught supplemental course to help students develop skills.

scripts.release: standard-version && sh -c 'git pull origin $(git branch --show-current) && git push --force --set-upstream origin $(git branch --show-current) --follow-tags --no-verify'
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test
